Posts.Content: jamiru wrote: I was diagnosed with IDC 2 years ago, had chemo & mastectomy for grade 2. I now have a dull pain in my pelvis, left side, very fatiqued all the time and a pink discharge. Chemo made me menopausal. Has anyone experienced something like this? Of course I am afraid. I welcome anyones comments. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: pelvic pain and pink discharge jamiru badboob67

Posts.Content: Sep 24, 2007 04:39AM jamiru wrote: Well, it's no longer a pink discharge but full on bleeding. I went to my GP today and will be seeing a gyno next week to start a barrage of tests. He said he can't reassure me that it isn't uterine cancer. Bugger
